Properties.string: Cast a spell to curse your enemies!

Properties.ProtectedString:
--Rescripted by TakeoHonorable
local Tool = script.Parent
local Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
--Handle:WaitForChild("Smoke").Enabled = true
local SpellGui = Tool:WaitForChild("SpellGui"):Clone()
local BookSound = Handle:WaitForChild("BookSound")
local Remote = Tool:WaitForChild("ClientInput") --local MouseLoc = Tool:WaitForChild("MouseLoc")
local ChosenSpellTag -- Dosen't do anything until a spell is chosen
local BaseUrl = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id="
local Properties = { CurrentRadius = 20, }
local Services = { Debris = (game:FindService("Debris") or game:GetService("Debris")), Players = (game:FindService("Players") or game:GetService("Players")), }
local MyPlayer,MyCharacter,MyHumanoid,MyTorso
function IsTeamMate(Player1, Player2) return (Player1 and Player2 and not Player1.Neutral and not Player2.Neutral and Player1.TeamColor == Player2.TeamColor) end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator"; Creator_Tag.Value = player; Services.Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for _, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function IsInTable(Table,Value) for _,v in pairs(Table) do if v == Value then return true end end return false end
local IconConnections = {}
local function SelectSpell(ChosenSpell,SpellUI) --print("Choosing Spell") if not SpellGui or not ChosenSpell then return end for _,v in pairs(SpellUI:GetDescendants()) do if v.Name == "Flavor" then v.Visible = v.Parent == ChosenSpell end end ChosenSpellTag = ChosenSpell.Name end
local Spell1,Spell2,Spell3,Spell4 = true,true,true,true -- Allows for consecutive reloads
local SpellFunctions = { ["OneHealth"] = function(CharTable) if not Spell1 then return end Spell1 = false
Handle:WaitForChild("BookSound"):Play()
local Anim = MyHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool:FindFirstChild("BookAnim"..MyHumanoid.RigType.Name)) if Anim then Anim:Play() end
local Icon = SpellGui:WaitForChild("SpellGuiFrame"):WaitForChild(ChosenSpellTag) local Overlay = Icon:WaitForChild("Overlay") local LastText = Overlay.Text Icon.Image = BaseUrl.."2690241454" coroutine.wrap(function() for _,charaters in pairs(CharTable) do if not charaters:FindFirstChild("OneHealth") then local Script = script:WaitForChild("OneHealth"):Clone() Script.Parent = charaters Script.Disabled = false end end end)()
for timer=20,1,-1 do Overlay.Text = ".."..timer..".." wait(1) end Overlay.Text = LastText Icon.Image = BaseUrl.."2689173936" Spell1 = true end,
["HalfHealth"] = function(CharTable) if not Spell2 then return end Spell2 = false
Handle:WaitForChild("BookSound"):Play() local Anim = MyHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool:FindFirstChild("BookAnim"..MyHumanoid.RigType.Name)) if Anim then Anim:Play() end
local Icon = SpellGui:WaitForChild("SpellGuiFrame"):WaitForChild(ChosenSpellTag) local Overlay = Icon:WaitForChild("Overlay") local LastText = Overlay.Text Icon.Image = BaseUrl.."2690242636" coroutine.wrap(function() for _,charaters in pairs(CharTable) do if not charaters:FindFirstChild("HalfHealth") then local Script = script:WaitForChild("HalfHealth"):Clone() Script.Parent = charaters Script.Disabled = false end end end)() for timer=10,1,-1 do Overlay.Text = ".."..timer..".." wait(1) end Overlay.Text = LastText Icon.Image = BaseUrl.."2689174848" Spell2 = true end, ["Health&Speed"] = function(CharTable) if not Spell3 then return end Spell3 = false
Handle:WaitForChild("BookSound"):Play()
local Anim = MyHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool:FindFirstChild("BookAnim"..MyHumanoid.RigType.Name)) if Anim then Anim:Play() end
local Icon = SpellGui:WaitForChild("SpellGuiFrame"):WaitForChild(ChosenSpellTag) local Overlay = Icon:WaitForChild("Overlay") local LastText = Overlay.Text Icon.Image = BaseUrl.."2690242263" coroutine.wrap(function() for _,charaters in pairs(CharTable) do if not charaters:FindFirstChild("Health&Speed") then local Script = script:WaitForChild("Health&Speed"):Clone() local Creator = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator.Name = "Creator" Creator.Value = MyPlayer Creator.Parent = Script Script.Parent = charaters Script.Disabled = false end end end)() for timer=7,1,-1 do Overlay.Text = ".."..timer..".." wait(1) end Overlay.Text = LastText Icon.Image = BaseUrl.."2689174652" Spell3 = true end, ["LessSpeed"] = function(CharTable) if not Spell4 then return end Spell4 = false
Handle:WaitForChild("BookSound"):Play()
local Anim = MyHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool:FindFirstChild("BookAnim"..MyHumanoid.RigType.Name)) if Anim then Anim:Play() end
local Icon = SpellGui:WaitForChild("SpellGuiFrame"):WaitForChild(ChosenSpellTag) local Overlay = Icon:WaitForChild("Overlay") local LastText = Overlay.Text Icon.Image = BaseUrl.."2690241889" coroutine.wrap(function() for _,charaters in pairs(CharTable) do if not charaters:FindFirstChild("LessSpeed") then local Script = script:WaitForChild("LessSpeed"):Clone() Script.Parent = charaters Script.Disabled = false end end end)() for timer=12,1,-1 do Overlay.Text = ".."..timer..".." wait(1) end Overlay.Text = LastText Icon.Image = BaseUrl.."2689174397" Spell4 = true end }
function Equipped() MyCharacter = Tool.Parent; MyHumanoid = MyCharacter:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid"); MyPlayer = Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(MyCharacter); MyTorso = MyCharacter:WaitForChild("HumanoidRootPart") SpellGui.Parent = MyPlayer:WaitForChild("PlayerGui") IconConnections[#IconConnections+1] = SpellGui:WaitForChild("SpellGuiFrame"):WaitForChild("HalfHealth").MouseButton1Click:Connect(function() SelectSpell(SpellGui:WaitForChild("SpellGuiFrame"):WaitForChild("HalfHealth"),SpellGui) end) IconConnections[#IconConnections+1] = SpellGui:WaitForChild("SpellGuiFrame"):WaitForChild("Health&Speed").MouseButton1Click:Connect(function() SelectSpell(SpellGui:WaitForChild("SpellGuiFrame"):WaitForChild("Health&Speed"),SpellGui) end) IconConnections[#IconConnections+1] = SpellGui:WaitForChild("SpellGuiFrame"):WaitForChild("LessSpeed").MouseButton1Click:Connect(function() SelectSpell(SpellGui:WaitForChild("SpellGuiFrame"):WaitForChild("LessSpeed"),SpellGui) end) IconConnections[#IconConnections+1] = SpellGui:WaitForChild("SpellGuiFrame"):WaitForChild("OneHealth").MouseButton1Click:Connect(function() SelectSpell(SpellGui:WaitForChild("SpellGuiFrame"):WaitForChild("OneHealth"),SpellGui) end) end
function Unequipped() --MyCharacter,MyHumanoid,MyPlayer,MyTorso = nil,nil,nil,nil SpellGui.Parent = nil for _,v in pairs(IconConnections) do if v then v:Disconnect() end end end
function Activated() if (MyCharacter and MyHumanoid) and MyHumanoid.Health ~= 0 and ChosenSpellTag then if ChosenSpellTag then --if not Tool.Enabled then return end --Tool.Enabled = false --print("Activated") local Pos = MyTorso.CFrame.p + Vector3.new(1,1,1)*Properties.CurrentRadius local Neg = MyTorso.CFrame.p - Vector3.new(1,1,1)*Properties.CurrentRadius local Region = Region3.new(Neg,Pos) local CharacterTable = {} for _,parts in pairs(workspace:FindPartsInRegion3WithIgnoreList(Region,{MyCharacter},math.huge)) do if parts and parts.Parent and (parts.CFrame.p-MyTorso.CFrame.p).Magnitude <= Properties.CurrentRadius and parts.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") and not IsInTable(CharacterTable,parts.Parent) then local Hum,ForceField = parts.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid"),parts.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("ForceField") if not ForceField and Hum and Hum.Health ~= 0 and not IsTeamMate(MyPlayer,Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Hum.Parent)) then CharacterTable[#CharacterTable+1] = parts.Parent end end end SpellFunctions[ChosenSpellTag](CharacterTable) --Handle:WaitForChild("Smoke").Enabled = true --Tool.Enabled = true end end end
Tool.Equipped:Connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:Connect(Unequipped) Tool.Activated:Connect(Activated)
Remote.OnServerEvent:Connect(function(Player,KeyCode) if Player ~= MyPlayer or not MyCharacter or not MyHumanoid then return end
if KeyCode == Enum.KeyCode.Q then SelectSpell(SpellGui:WaitForChild("SpellGuiFrame"):WaitForChild("OneHealth"),SpellGui) elseif KeyCode == Enum.KeyCode.E then SelectSpell(SpellGui:WaitForChild("SpellGuiFrame"):WaitForChild("HalfHealth"),SpellGui) elseif KeyCode == Enum.KeyCode.R then SelectSpell(SpellGui:WaitForChild("SpellGuiFrame"):WaitForChild("Health&Speed"),SpellGui) elseif KeyCode == Enum.KeyCode.X then SelectSpell(SpellGui:WaitForChild("SpellGuiFrame"):WaitForChild("LessSpeed"),SpellGui) end end)

local Particle = script:WaitForChild("Particle")
local Character = script.Parent
local Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
local AffectedParts = {"torso"} -- Highlight the bodyparts with the name found
local ParticleTable = {}
if Humanoid and Humanoid.Health ~= 0 then Humanoid.Health = Humanoid.Health * 0.5 Humanoid.MaxHealth = 50.0
for _,bodyparts in pairs(Character:GetChildren()) do if bodyparts:IsA("BasePart") then local found = false for _,v in pairs(AffectedParts) do if string.find(string.lower(bodyparts.Name),v) then found = true end end if found then local effect = Particle:Clone() ParticleTable[#ParticleTable+1] = effect effect.Parent = bodyparts effect.Enabled = true end end end wait(10.0) Humanoid.MaxHealth = 100.0 if Humanoid.Health * 2.0 <= Humanoid.MaxHealth then Humanoid.Health = Humanoid.Health * 2.0 else Humanoid.Health = 100 end end
for _,particles in pairs(ParticleTable) do if particles then particles:Destroy() end end script:Destroy()

Properties.string: Particle texture must be 1024 by 1024 to use flipbooks.

Properties.ProtectedString:
local Particle = script:WaitForChild("Particle")
local Creator = script:WaitForChild("Creator")
local Character = script.Parent
local Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
local AffectedParts = {"torso","leg","foot"} -- Highlight the bodyparts with the name found
local ParticleTable = {}
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator"; Creator_Tag.Value = player; game:GetService("Debris"):AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for _, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
if Humanoid and Humanoid.Health ~= 0 then UntagHumanoid(Humanoid) TagHumanoid(Humanoid,Creator) Humanoid:TakeDamage(50) Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 12.0 for _,bodyparts in pairs(Character:GetChildren()) do if bodyparts:IsA("BasePart") then local found = false for _,v in pairs(AffectedParts) do if string.find(string.lower(bodyparts.Name),v) then found = true end end if found then local effect = Particle:Clone() ParticleTable[#ParticleTable+1] = effect effect.Parent = bodyparts effect.Enabled = true end end end wait(10.0) Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 end for _,particles in pairs(ParticleTable) do if particles then particles:Destroy() end end script:Destroy()

Properties.string: Particle texture must be 1024 by 1024 to use flipbooks.

Properties.ProtectedString:
local Particle = script:WaitForChild("Particle")
local Character = script.Parent
local Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
local AffectedParts = {"head"} -- Highlight the bodyparts with the name found
if Humanoid and Humanoid.Health ~= 0 then
if Humanoid.Health > 1 then Humanoid.Health = 1 end
for _,bodyparts in pairs(Character:GetChildren()) do if bodyparts:IsA("BasePart") then local found = false for _,v in pairs(AffectedParts) do if string.find(string.lower(bodyparts.Name),v) then found = true end end if found then local effect = Particle:Clone() game:GetService("Debris"):AddItem(effect,3) effect.Parent = bodyparts effect.Enabled = true end end end end
script:Destroy()

Properties.string: Particle texture must be 1024 by 1024 to use flipbooks.

Properties.ProtectedString:
local Particle = script:WaitForChild("Particle")
local Character = script.Parent
local Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
local AffectedParts = {"leg","foot"} -- Highlight the bodyparts with the name found
local ParticleTable = {}
if Humanoid and Humanoid.Health ~= 0 then
Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 4.0
for _,bodyparts in pairs(Character:GetChildren()) do if bodyparts:IsA("BasePart") then local found = false for _,v in pairs(AffectedParts) do if string.find(string.lower(bodyparts.Name),v) then found = true end end if found then local effect = Particle:Clone() ParticleTable[#ParticleTable+1] = effect effect.Parent = bodyparts effect.Enabled = true end end end
wait(10.0)
Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 end
for _,particles in pairs(ParticleTable) do if particles then particles:Destroy() end end script:Destroy()

Properties.string: Particle texture must be 1024 by 1024 to use flipbooks.

Properties.ProtectedString:
--Rescripted by TakeoHonorable
local Tool = script.Parent
local Remote = Tool:WaitForChild("ClientInput") --local MouseLoc = Tool:WaitForChild("MouseLoc")
local Input = (game:FindService("ContextActionService") or game:GetService("ContextActionService"))
local function SetSpell(ActionName,InputState,InputObj) if InputState == Enum.UserInputState.Begin then Remote:FireServer(InputObj.KeyCode) end end
function Unequipped() Input:UnbindAction("SetFirstSpell") Input:UnbindAction("SetSecondSpell") Input:UnbindAction("SetThirdSpell") Input:UnbindAction("SetFourthSpell") end
function Equipped() Input:BindAction("SetFirstSpell",SetSpell,false,Enum.KeyCode.Q) Input:BindAction("SetSecondSpell",SetSpell,false,Enum.KeyCode.E) Input:BindAction("SetThirdSpell",SetSpell,false,Enum.KeyCode.R) Input:BindAction("SetFourthSpell",SetSpell,false,Enum.KeyCode.X) end
Tool.Equipped:Connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:Connect(Unequipped)
--[[function MouseLoc.OnClientInvoke() return game:GetService("Players").LocalPlayer:GetMouse().Hit.p end]]

--Made by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:Connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:Connect(OnChanged)
